name: Portuguese-Style Steamed Mussels
keywords: chorizo, dry white wine, mussels, dairy-free, gluten-free, fall, main course
recipeIngredient: 1 small red bell pepper, cut in 1/4-inch dice
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and finely chopped
1/4 pound chourico or chorizo sausage, thinly sliced
3 pounds mussels (preferably wild) scrubbed and debearded
Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a large (6 quart) casserole or soup pot over medium-high heat, combine olive oil and bay leaves. Heat for 1 minute, then add garlic, onion and red bell pepper. Saute vegetables until tender, about 5 minutes. Add tomatoes, sausage and wine. Simmer for 5 minutes.

Add mussels. Cover and steam until mussels open, about 5 minutes. Remove mussels to serving bowls. Return pot to medium heat, and add parsley, cilantro and black pepper to taste. Spoon sauce over mussels, and serve immediately.
